Documentation for CM¶

CM (C for Media) is the kernel programming language for the Media Development Framework (MDF) for Intel HD Graphics.

This is the language and compiler documentation for CM.

Contents¶

CM (C for Media) Language Specification

CMC User Guide

CM (C for Media) Tutorial

Much of the cm-llvm design documentation concerns the GenX backend and the LLVM IR it expects, and is thus part of the LLVM documentation. Assuming you have a standard cm-llvm source tree and you have built all the documentation, the GenX backend documentation starts here. The rest of the LLVM documentation is also accessible from there.
